title: Bloomberg Markets: Marcus Sees Period of `Extreme Change'

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David E Marcus\u0010CEO\u0010Evermore Global Advisors\u0010Discussing the global markets and how large companies are refocusing core businesses.
